title: Kristen Bell praises daughter's decision to shave head and we agree
text:
Kristen, pictured at the 2019 Comic-Con, also has very cool hair (Picture: Getty Images)

Kristen Bell has called her daughter’s decision to shave the side of her head a ‘ballsier choice than I’ll ever be able to make.’

Same, to be honest!

The Frozen 2 star revealed her six-and-a-half-year-old daughter Lincoln had chosen the edgy hairstyle back in May.

Speaking to People, proud mum Kristen exclaimed: ‘Hell yeah, I’m all for it!’

The Good Place star furthermore added: ‘Look, it’s her body. It’s not my head — that’s a cooler, ballsier choice than I’ll ever be able to make.’

Talking about her honest parenting style, Kristen went on: ‘I did say to her, “You know, it will take a year to grow back. It’s really not going to be there, so I want you to make sure that you’re into it.”‘

We want Kristen’s advice before our next risky haircut!

Kristen, along with husband Dax Shephard, is also a parent to daughter Delta. The Hollywood couple has not yet shared pictures of their daughters with the wider world in which you can see their whole faces.

Kristen’s interview follows her trip to the emergency room with one of her daughters back in August, after the little one got her finger jammed in the door.

Kristen’s daughter had to visit the hospital in August (Picture: Instagram)

Addressing the incident in the caption, Kristen said: ‘First emergency room visit. One hairline fracture and a finger smushed so hard in the door it popped like a jelly donut.’

Bless!
